title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {jsutils: 'JavaScript' Utilities for 'R'},   author = {Andrew R. Johnson},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://andrjohns.github.io/jsutils/}, }

title: JavaScript Utilities for R
text: jsutils package provides portable collection JavaScript utility functions libraries R users. package currently provides bindings following JavaScript libraries: esprima: Tokeniser Parser JavaScript sass: CSS preprocessor, compiling SCSS SASS files CSS terser: minifier/mangler JavaScript code typescript: superset JavaScript compiles clean JavaScript output

title: JavaScript Utilities for R
text: can install development version jsutils GitHub :

what: esprima: Tokeniser and Parser for JavaScript
title: JavaScript Utilities for R
text: Separate esprima_parse esprima_tokenize functions provided parse tokenize JavaScript code respectively:
code: library(jsutils)  js_code <- "function hello() { console.log('Hello, world!'); }"  # Parse JavaScript code esprima_parse(js_code) #> $type #> [1] "Program" #>  #> $body #> $body[[1]] #> $body[[1]]$type #> [1] "FunctionDeclaration" #>  #> $body[[1]]$id #> $body[[1]]$id$type #> [1] "Identifier" #>  #> $body[[1]]$id$name #> [1] "hello" #>  #>  #> $body[[1]]$params #> logical(0) #>  #> $body[[1]]$body #> $body[[1]]$body$type #> [1] "BlockStatement" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]] #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$type #> [1] "ExpressionStatement" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$type #> [1] "CallExpression" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$type #> [1] "MemberExpression" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$computed #> [1] FALSE #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$object #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$object$type #> [1] "Identifier" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$object$name #> [1] "console" #>  #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$property #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$property$type #> [1] "Identifier" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$callee$property$name #> [1] "log" #>  #>  #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$arguments #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$arguments[[1]] #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$arguments[[1]]$type #> [1] "Literal" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$arguments[[1]]$value #> [1] "Hello, world!" #>  #> $body[[1]]$body$body[[1]]$expression$arguments[[1]]$raw #> [1] "'Hello, world!'" #>  #>  #>  #>  #>  #>  #>  #> $body[[1]]$generator #> [1] FALSE #>  #> $body[[1]]$expression #> [1] FALSE #>  #> $body[[1]]$async #> [1] FALSE #>  #>  #>  #> $sourceType #> [1] "script"  # Tokenize JavaScript code esprima_tokenize(js_code) #> [[1]] #> [[1]]$type #> [1] "Keyword" #>  #> [[1]]$value #> [1] "function" #>  #>  #> [[2]] #> [[2]]$type #> [1] "Identifier" #>  #> [[2]]$value #> [1] "hello" #>  #>  #> [[3]] #> [[3]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[3]]$value #> [1] "(" #>  #>  #> [[4]] #> [[4]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[4]]$value #> [1] ")" #>  #>  #> [[5]] #> [[5]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[5]]$value #> [1] "{" #>  #>  #> [[6]] #> [[6]]$type #> [1] "Identifier" #>  #> [[6]]$value #> [1] "console" #>  #>  #> [[7]] #> [[7]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[7]]$value #> [1] "." #>  #>  #> [[8]] #> [[8]]$type #> [1] "Identifier" #>  #> [[8]]$value #> [1] "log" #>  #>  #> [[9]] #> [[9]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[9]]$value #> [1] "(" #>  #>  #> [[10]] #> [[10]]$type #> [1] "String" #>  #> [[10]]$value #> [1] "'Hello, world!'" #>  #>  #> [[11]] #> [[11]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[11]]$value #> [1] ")" #>  #>  #> [[12]] #> [[12]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[12]]$value #> [1] ";" #>  #>  #> [[13]] #> [[13]]$type #> [1] "Punctuator" #>  #> [[13]]$value #> [1] "}"

title: JavaScript Utilities for R
text: sass function compiles SCSS SASS code CSS:

what: terser: A minifier/mangler for JavaScript code
title: JavaScript Utilities for R
text: terser function minifies JavaScript code:
code: js_code <- "function hello() { console.log('Hello, world!'); }"  # Minify JavaScript code terser(js_code) #> $code #> [1] "function hello(){console.log(\"Hello, world!\")}"  # With options terser(js_code, list(mangle=list(toplevel = TRUE))) #> $code #> [1] "function o(){console.log(\"Hello, world!\")}"

what: typescript: A superset of JavaScript that compiles to clean JavaScript output
title: JavaScript Utilities for R
text: typescript function compiles TypeScript code JavaScript:
code: ts_code <- "let arrow_func = (msg: string): void => { console.log(msg); };"  # Compile TypeScript code to JavaScript typescript(ts_code) #> $outputText #> [1] "var arrow_func = function (msg) { console.log(msg); };\n" #>  #> $diagnostics #> logical(0) #>  #> $sourceMapText #> NULL  # With options typescript(ts_code, options = list(compilerOptions = list(target = "ES2015"))) #> $outputText #> [1] "let arrow_func = (msg) => { console.log(msg); };\n" #>  #> $diagnostics #> logical(0) #>  #> $sourceMapText #> NULL

what: Parse or Tokenize JavaScript code using Esprima — esprima
title: Parse or Tokenize JavaScript code using Esprima — esprima
text: Use Esprima library parse tokenize JavaScript code. Note first time function called, load TypeScript library JavaScript context, may take seconds. Subsequent calls faster.

title: Parse or Tokenize JavaScript code using Esprima — esprima
code: esprima_parse(input, options = list(), type = "script")  esprima_tokenize(input, options = list())

title: Parse or Tokenize JavaScript code using Esprima — esprima
text: input character string containing JavaScript code parsed tokenized. options list configuration options pass Esprima parser tokenizer. type character string specifying type code parse: "script" (default) "module".

title: Parse or Tokenize JavaScript code using Esprima — esprima
text: esprima_parse, list representing Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) parsed code. esprima_tokenize, list tokens extracted input code.

title: Parse or Tokenize JavaScript code using Esprima — esprima

what: Get versions of bundled JavaScript libraries — js_versions
title: Get versions of bundled JavaScript libraries — js_versions
text: function returns versions bundled JavaScript libraries used package.

title: Get versions of bundled JavaScript libraries — js_versions
Get versions of bundled JavaScript libraries — js_versions
text: named list versions Esprima, sass.js, Terser, TypeScript.

title: Get versions of bundled JavaScript libraries — js_versions
jsutils: 'JavaScript' Utilities for 'R' — jsutils-package
text: collection popular/useful JavaScript utilities, including terser minifier, sass compiler, typescript transpiler, .

title: jsutils: 'JavaScript' Utilities for 'R' — jsutils-package
text: Maintainer: Andrew R. Johnson andrew.johnson@arjohnsonau.com (ORCID)

what: Compile SASS/SCSS to CSS using the sass.js library — sass
title: Compile SASS/SCSS to CSS using the sass.js library — sass
text: function uses sass.js library compile SASS/SCSS code CSS. leverages QuickJSR package run JavaScript code within R. Note first time function called, load TypeScript library JavaScript context, may take seconds. Subsequent calls faster.

title: Compile SASS/SCSS to CSS using the sass.js library — sass
Compile SASS/SCSS to CSS using the sass.js library — sass
text: input character string containing SASS/SCSS code compiled. options list options pass sass.js compiler.

title: Compile SASS/SCSS to CSS using the sass.js library — sass
text: list containing compiled CSS code warnings errors.

title: Compile SASS/SCSS to CSS using the sass.js library — sass
code: scss_code <- "h1 { font-size: 40px; code { font-face: Roboto Mono; } }" sass(scss_code, list(style = "compressed")) #> $css #> [1] "h1{font-size:40px}h1 code{font-face:Roboto Mono}" #>  #> $loadedUrls #> logical(0) #>

what: Minify JavaScript code using Terser — terser
title: Minify JavaScript code using Terser — terser
text: Uses Terser JavaScript library minify JavaScript code. Note first time function called, load TypeScript library JavaScript context, may take seconds. Subsequent calls faster.

title: Minify JavaScript code using Terser — terser
Minify JavaScript code using Terser — terser
text: input character string containing JavaScript code minified. options list options pass Terser minification. See Terser documentation available options.

title: Minify JavaScript code using Terser — terser
text: list containing minified code warnings errors.

title: Minify JavaScript code using Terser — terser
code: js_code <- "function add(a, b) { return a + b; }" terser(js_code, list(sourceMap = TRUE)) #> $code #> [1] "function add(n,d){return n+d}" #>  #> $map #> [1] "{\"version\":3,\"names\":[\"add\",\"a\",\"b\"],\"sources\":[\"0\"],\"mappings\":\"AAAA,SAASA,IAAIC,EAAGC,GAAK,OAAOD,EAAIC,CAAG\",\"ignoreList\":[]}" #>  #> $decoded_map #> $decoded_map$version #> [1] 3 #>  #> $decoded_map$names #> [1] "add" "a"   "b"   #>  #> $decoded_map$sources #> [1] "0" #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]] #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[1]] #> [1] 0 0 0 0 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[2]] #> [1] 9 0 0 9 0 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[3]] #> [1] 13  0  0 13  1 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[4]] #> [1] 15  0  0 16  2 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[5]] #> [1] 18  0  0 21 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[6]] #> [1] 25  0  0 28  1 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[7]] #> [1] 27  0  0 32  2 #>  #> $decoded_map$mappings[[1]][[8]] #> [1] 28  0  0 35 #>  #>  #>  #> $decoded_map$ignoreList #> logical(0) #>  #>

what: Transpile TypeScript code to JavaScript — typescript
title: Transpile TypeScript code to JavaScript — typescript
text: function uses TypeScript compiler transpile TypeScript code JavaScript. Note first time function called, load TypeScript library JavaScript context, may take seconds. Subsequent calls faster.

title: Transpile TypeScript code to JavaScript — typescript
Transpile TypeScript code to JavaScript — typescript
text: input character string containing TypeScript code transpiled. options list options pass TypeScript transpiler. See TypeScript documentation available options.

title: Transpile TypeScript code to JavaScript — typescript
text: list containing transpiled JavaScript code diagnostics.

title: Transpile TypeScript code to JavaScript — typescript
code: ts_code <- "const greet = (name: string): string => `Hello, ${name}!`;" typescript(ts_code, list(compilerOptions = list(target = "ES5"))) #> $outputText #> [1] "var greet = function (name) { return \"Hello, \".concat(name, \"!\"); };\n" #>  #> $diagnostics #> logical(0) #>  #> $sourceMapText #> NULL #>
